message:
WeepingCAN Bus-Off Attack Simulator
  Stealth variant — attacker stays Error-Active throughout

Log file  : logs/weepingcan_20260226_164328.log
  JSON log  : logs/weepingcan_20260226_164328.jsonl
[ATTACKER] Pattern analysis complete → target CAN-ID=0x100  period≈10ms
[VICTIM] Preparing periodic frame  CAN-ID=0x100  seq=0x01  data=['0xde', '0xad', '0xbe', '0x1']
[ATTACKER] Building attack frame  CAN-ID=0x100  recessive-inject-at bit 28  (targeted — safe pool: [13, 18, 20, 22, 25, 28, 34])
Arbitration: SAME ID → both transmit together (WeepingCAN)
[BUS] ATTACKER injects RECESSIVE bit at position 28
[BUS] BIT ERROR detected by attacker (sent=1, read=0)
[ATTACKER] Step 3 — 5 valid frames: TEC −5: 8 → 3  [cycle net: +3  | victim cycle net: +7]
[VICTIM] Preparing periodic frame  CAN-ID=0x100  seq=0x02  data=['0xde', '0xad', '0xbe', '0x2']
[BUS] Injection mis-timed! Attacker missed the dominant bit. Attack cycle failed.
[ATTACKER] Mis-timed — victim transmits OK → Victim TEC: 7 → 6  (−1)
[ATTACKER] Mis-timed — attacker sent harmless recessive bit, no TEC penalty.  (mistimed #1)
